name.description: Name or title of the task

type.description: Type or category of the task

url.description: URL link to access detailed information about the task

iteration.description: Iteration or sprint associated with the task

projects.description: List of projects the task is part of

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the task was created

dueOn.description: Timestamp indicating the deadline for the task

labels.description: List of labels/tags associated with the task

time.description: Time tracking information for the task

total.description: Total time spent on the task

users.description: Individual time tracking for each user involved

timerTime.description: Time duration currently tracked by a timer

completed.description: Flag indicating if the task has been completed

completedAt.description: Timestamp when the task was marked as completed

assignees.description: List of users assigned to the task
